spec_data.Name: python-postman
spec_data.Description:
Postman is a command line utility for working with
Amazon Simple Email Service (SES)

A tutorial for using postman is available here:
http://aws.amazon.com/articles/2405502737055650
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 02:54:38 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Postman is a command line utility for working with Amazon SES
